channel.title: Projects
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jacob's Website

item.title: Chronicler for CK3
item.description: Chronicler is a terminal application for managing after-action reports (AARs) for Crusader Kings 3.

item.title: All for One
item.description: All for One is a Hugo theme that covers several uses for a personal website - a blog, portfolio, and CV.

item.title: Pyronsworn
item.description: Pyronsworn is a Python module for managing character sheets for the tabletop rpg Ironsworn.
